sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 402,432 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 188,579.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 402,432 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 188,579.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,355, further increased by 881 while you remain within its light.
Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 642,470 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
